tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: ♪ Screw the Nether (Moves Like Jagger Parody)
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: ♪ Available on iTunes! itunes.apple.com To celebrate Martyn Littlewood joining us at YogTowers, here's a specially made song and video featuring the vocal talents of Martyn, Lewis and Simon, mixed by Sparkles* and animated by Ciaran! Featuring Martyn Littlewood: www.youtube.com Ciaran's Animations: www.youtube.com Arranged and additional vocals by Sparkles*: www.youtube.com ● Yogscast Gear: yogscast.spreadshirt.co.uk ● Facebook: www.facebook.com ● Twitter: www.twitter.com ● Forums: yogscast.com ● Podcast: itunes.apple.com ● Powered by Chillblast: www.chillblast.com ● PO Box: The Yogscast, PO Box 3125, Bristol, BS2 2DG

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: You got a potion use it﻿
so what﻿
what is your old fave song?﻿
Dont expect﻿ to See any creepers!!!!!!!!!!!
Disconnected MONSTERCAT﻿
ikr xD﻿
best song ever!﻿
The Animals look better in flash﻿ then they do in Minecraft.
They left Simon﻿ in the nether...
sup ﻿
I think I've killed the﻿ replay button..
I won't worn you TWICEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE﻿
its﻿ so addictive!!!!!
Ive hit the replay button to many times... NOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!﻿
DANG, Simon u should sing more﻿ often lol man, yogscast and the saplings RULE!!
Own it on iTunes.. Btw.... Martin has a Super Hot﻿ Voice <33
so? derp﻿
is Martyn first then Lewis Then Simon﻿ (as Christina)
Best﻿ Parody Ever !!! If Someone Need Free Minecraft Premium Accounts check this link--> bit.ly\PremiumGift4You (copy link in browser)
lol﻿
They forgot the﻿ Blazes!!!!!
my reply broke.. i blame the awesome and﻿ addictive song great job guys!
playing﻿ it on my phone while listning on here"!!!!!1
At first I couldnt tell﻿ if it was really Luis and simon singing
